title: Allstate B2B 4-Year Major Appliances Protection Plan ($200 - $299.99)
features: Plan starts on the date of purchase. Product breakdowns and malfunctions are covered after manufacturer's warranty.
No additional costs for repairs - parts, labor and shipping are all included.
Easy claims process - file a claim anytime 24/7 via mobile app, online or phone.
description: Upon purchase, you will get an email confirmation from Allstate/SquareTrade. You will not be mailed a paper contract. If you have questions, please call: 1.877.WARRANTY.
